legal_basis: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA), sections 97, 112-116
presumption of truthfulness in Personal Information Form (PIF)
procedural_fairness: Officer improperly focused on state efforts rather than results
erred in reliance on non-state agencies
Applicant's PIF statements were not adequately considered
reasonableness_standard: The officer's decision was unreasonable and lacked justification
decision_outcome: Judicial review granted, case remitted for re-determination
review_standard: Court allowed judicial review, remitting case to a different officer for reassessment
